channel.title: Discord-Hiatus Explained
channel.description:
As many of you may know and not care, I haven't been in the Discord lately. This is because I cause too much trouble, it's for the best of I and you that I don't go there for a while. It brings drama to you and I and it's best I stay away from that. It's bad for the soul. I will still play on the game and I will try to be active on the forums so I can still proudly show my support for this awesome game. But not in the Discord. It's make always me uncomfortable and it will bring mine self esteem to a low that I don't want. I want happiness in life, and I don't want to make others unhappy. and that's why I'm doing this, I hope you can forgive me and here's reasons why I will list below.
1. I may forget to take my medicine, and you say something I take the wrong way and it escalates 2. It's late and I need to sleep, cranky. 3. I don't like you, and/or you don't like me / Personality Clash. 4. Lack of substance in my tummy. Hunger makes people more susceptible to anger. 5. Discord is making me mad because it launches whenever I turn on my PC which takes it longer to login. 6. I get addicted to the Discord which is bad while I'm in School and Work. Type, type, type. 7. Occasionally my humor goes to the deepest depths of darkness, which is offending to some. 8. Shipping.. I like to ship people, who doesn't? But well, some people don't like to be shipped with some people- and I need to respect that. I do. I try, but it's hard. 9. Kinda like 6. but a little different. I'm having schooling now. 10. Life is short, we can't spent all of it typing on our cell-phones, I should go see the world, and bury my feet under the sand and melt the sand to glass and have glass slippers. 11. No more reasons, I already gave you 10. That's not enough? If so, I am sorry and I will try to think of more if you'd like, but fear not, I shall see you in-game <3
I am sorry for this friends. https://media.giphy.com/media/12hZ5PWW5wS6nC/giphy.gif Death is swift if you see me in game. @Reason 11.

Oh golly gee, you made me go to /r/me_irl and now I am scarred for life.

Read full topic

item.title: Discord-Hiatus Explained
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
As many of you may know and not care, I haven’t been in the Discord lately. This is because I cause too much trouble, it’s for the best of I and you that I don’t go there for a while. It brings drama to you and I and it’s best I stay away from that. It’s bad for the soul. I will still play on the game and I will try to be active on the forums so I can still proudly show my support for this awesome game. But not in the Discord. It’s make always me uncomfortable and it will bring mine self esteem to a low that I don’t want. I want happiness in life, and I don’t want to make others unhappy. and that’s why I’m doing this, I hope you can forgive me and here’s reasons why I will list below.

  1. I may forget to take my medicine, and you say something I take the wrong way and it escalates
  2. It’s late and I need to sleep, cranky.
  3. I don’t like you, and/or you don’t like me / Personality Clash.
  4. Lack of substance in my tummy. Hunger makes people more susceptible to anger.
  5. Discord is making me mad because it launches whenever I turn on my PC which takes it longer to login.
  6. I get addicted to the Discord which is bad while I’m in School and Work. Type, type, type.
  7. Occasionally my humor goes to the deepest depths of darkness, which is offending to some.
  8. Shipping… I like to ship people, who doesn’t? But well, some people don’t like to be shipped with some people- and I need to respect that. I do. I try, but it’s hard.
  9. Kinda like 6. but a little different. I’m having schooling now.
  10. Life is short, we can’t spent all of it typing on our cell-phones, I should go see the world, and bury my feet under the sand and melt the sand to glass and have glass slippers.
  11. No more reasons, I already gave you 10. That’s not enough? If so, I am sorry and I will try to think of more if you’d like, but fear not, I shall see you in-game <3

I am sorry for this friends.
https://media.giphy.com/media/12hZ5PWW5wS6nC/giphy.gif
Death is swift if you see me in game. @Reason 11.

Read full topic
